channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 10/09/2023 INC#1418

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1418; 06:58PM; 7900 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FgRiY5; #VanNuys; Two vehicle collision, with one vehicle striking a light pole, trapping and critically injuring a female passenger. The female driver of that car (serious condition), and the male driver of the other car (fair condition) , were not trapped. Unknown patient ages, affiliation or circumstances. All three have been taken to regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incidents #3563/3565); FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E39 E81 E90 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA81 RA881 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1418; 06:31PM; 7900 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FgRiY5; #VanNuys; PRELIM: At least three patients at a multi-vehicle traffic collision with entrapment.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E39 E81 E90 EM15 HR3 RA81 RA881 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0968; 02:35PM; 11400 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FaGfjb; #VermontVista; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 45 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames in a 2800 square foot one-story 'Jack In The Box' fast food restaurant (built 2002) that was in operation at the time of the fire. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E233 E264 E266 E57 E64 E65 E79 EM11 FR64 RA264 RA864 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0968; 01:50PM; 11400 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FaGfjb; #VermontVista; PRELIM: Offensive firefight in a one-story fast food restaurant.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 FR64 RA264 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1356; 06:08PM; 9701 W Yoakum Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/46FZrkM; #BeverlyCrest; 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 34 minutes to fully extinguish stubborn fire that was largely confined to the garage area on the first (lowest - street level) floor of a 2,943 square foot three-story ascending hillside home (built 1945). All occupants out on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 99; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E108 E278 E288 E71 E99 RA71 RA878 RA99 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1356; 05:34PM; 9701 W Yoakum Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/46FZrkM; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Offensive fire attack at a three story ascending hillside home with fire on the "bottom floor". ; FS 99; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E108 E278 E288 E71 E99 RA878 RA99 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1073; 02:59PM; 10480 W National Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45qqFdY; #Palms; 48 Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one top floor apartment containing excessive personal storage, in the northwest section of a 53,762 square foot, 80 unit, three-story garden style apartment building (built 1968). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 CM20 CM22 E237 E263 E292 E43 E58 E62 E63 EM9 RA37 RA58 RA892 SO1 T37 T63 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1073; 02:41PM; 10480 W National Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45qqFdY; #Palms; PRELIM: Offensive battle against fire showing from one unit on the top (third) floor of a three-story apartment building.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 CM20 CM22 E237 E263 E292 E43 E58 E62 E63 EM9 RA37 RA58 RA892 SO1 T37 T63 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0738; 11:37AM; 908 N Macneil St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46GcRgI; City of #SanFernando; 23 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames within a detached two car garage conversion, that was fully involved with fire on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District City of #SanFernando; BC12 E287 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0738; 11:24AM; 908 N Macneil St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46GcRgI; City of #SanFernando; PRELIM: Offensive firefighting operations at a detached two car garage conversion fully involved with fire, to the rear of a one-story home. No other structures threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District City of San Fernando; BC12 E287 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
